website_summaries.verdict: With a 720p resolution and HDMI 1.4a 3D support, the Acer H5370BD fully qualifies as an entry-level 3D home entertainment projector.
pros: Two HDMI ports including one HDMI with MHL
cons: Low volume with no audio output

customer_reviews.title: Hardware failure after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: I should review items more often. This Acer Projector lost me. I thought I was getting a fair deal when I bought it in April 2014. It started having problems in October 2015. $500.00 for a year and a half. The picture was good and I liked the 2D/3D feature but spending that much money on a product that is going to fail in a year and a half seems like poor quality from the manufacturer. I looked into repair and they sent an email asking for $255.00 plus the cost of sending the projector to them. I'm buying a different projector instead and recommending to everyone not to buy Acer. Companies shouldn't be rewarded for underpriced poor quality products.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: My husbands favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: I asked my husband what his favorite gift was from me ever...it was this. He must really enjoy it and he has had a lot of cool toys!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PQ and Vibrant Color
customer_reviews.text: I was using Epson EX-71 earlier and when the time for change came, I checked various models in economoy range and settled for Acer H5370BD. I am very happy with the purchase. Pros 1) Price - Real VFM 2) Color - Very Vibrant 3) Black - As stated by many in their reviews, black is black with this PJ Cons 1) Screen size for the same distance is lesser comparing to my earlier PJ Epson EX71 2) HDMI handsake is not as smooth as my earlier PJ. I need to maintain the sequence for switching on/off the equipments, which was not a worry with my earlier PJ Yet to experience 3D as I have not got the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeyaraj K

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: So clear, crisp, perfect! I love it! Extremely powerful light (I can see during the day with the sun on the screen). Gaming is....crazy! Would recommend to anyone looking for an alternative to a TV. :) UPDATE: Owned for over 8 months, still works perfectly at 2400 hours on lamp. I now have a screen that is 11 feet!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Petro

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great price great projector. I have no complaints at all. The picture quality on my plain white wall is fantastic. It has auto keystone which makes works really good. The two hdmi ports are a huge plus. It doesn't have audio out capabilities but that is a non issue for me. I use a sound bar/subwoofer with hdmi in and out to solve that problem. PS3 gaming looks great. My screen size is about 108 inches on my plain wall and it's fantastic. I might buy a screen but right now I'm really happy without one. This is one of the best deals I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Hampton

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great and it is easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector to show outdoor movies on the side of my house. We have used it about six times over the summer and it works flawlessly. The picture is great and it is easy to operate. I recommend NOT using the built in speaker, but going with an AV receiver instead. For me, this was a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Review of Acer H5370BD
customer_reviews.text: Writing from Bangalore, India. Ordered this item from Amazon.com and a friend carried this back to India. As a first time PJ user, I was in a confusion whether to go for a 1080p PJ or a 720p PJ. After doing all the research i decided to buy the Acer H5370BD - a 720p resolution PJ and today I absolutely do not regret on my decision, I do not see any reason to go for a 1080p PJ. This serves the purpose of a human eye fantastically well. An absolute value for money PJ!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sreejith K Kurup

customer_reviews.title: great function; a little noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Good: - starts up easy - brightness and image quality are very good - terrific auto-squaring function (to compensate for fore-and-aft tilt) Not as good: - fan is kinda loud - hot spots blow out too often Its not perfect but for the price, hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: great image quality
customer_reviews.text: This projector has worked out well, ceiling mounted in our bedroom and projects onto a screen the pulls down over the bedroom window. Many nights in bed watching movies! It's been a solid performer, great image quality, run quiet and has last well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the bucks
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best starting point for someone who wants to experience big screen HD + 3D viewing at fraction of a cost. The setup was a breeze and the out of the box images were really good. I would say the 3D is okay, since I was expecting more pop out effects. Could be related to SBS 3D movies, yet to try 3D Blu Ray. So a point less there. Even the fan noise isnt really a distraction when placing the projector on a table. I am mighty impressed by what Acer has offered with this model, total VFM.
customer_reviews.author: Vishu Kashyap

customer_reviews.title: the 3d feature is poor in comparison to my 3d tv/dvd player combination
customer_reviews.text: the 3d feature is poor in comparison to my 3d tv/dvd player combination. I do like the projector though. It's good enough for home use. I'd buy another device from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: si

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, top pick by wirecutter, as long as 1080p isn't a must have.
customer_reviews.text: I got a lightly used, year-old model for half price. I can't complain. The only downside is only one aux jack and only 720p resolution, but for the price I paid it was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better out there for the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The picture quality is perfect and looks very crisp and just as good as any TV. I am just projecting onto a bedsheet, but it still looks really nice. The 3-D works great I like it more than passive 3-D in some ways. If you're looking for a good quality projector that does 3-D and native HD 720p under $500, this is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee A.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!! Bye bye flat screen.
customer_reviews.text: What is it about a bigger screen? It's awesome and the quality is great at such an affordable price. Easy to use. I'm saving a lot with movie nights in!
customer_reviews.author: dvswlf

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The audio is poor on this unit, but I never intended to use it's internal audio anyway, but the picture quality is really good. It is worth it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi T Seethamraju

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this much yet but so far I've been super impressed that you can see the image quite well without blacking out the room. It works well with an HDMI chord purchased separately to connect to a macbook pro.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Acer projector, replacing a similar model. Works great. The picture is bright and clear on my 110 inch screen. Colors look great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for only being 720p
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality for only being 720p. Mostly used for movies .For one year already mostly installed outside in South FL, no problem with humidity.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at our wedding and in our home
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at our wedding and in our home. Projects fine both on to a screen and on to non-standard surfaces. Very good picture quality. Just remember to buy a mount specifically made for this unit if you're going to mount it on the ceiling.

customer_reviews.title: no complaints, it's great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this projector in for home entertainment; I have no complaints, it's great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING clarity!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING clarity !!! good Blu-ray, DVD and 3D view. It looks fantastic when I connect my macbook pro to watch movies or shows. I even use apple tv with it, works great !!! Best FULL 3D DLP 720P projecter out there for the price

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review...

Cannot comment on 3D because we have never used it. Will be going with Acer when we upgrade.. Excellent projector!

customer_reviews.title: Nice cost/benefit
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product because it does what is supposed to do. Pros: Nice color. Nice distance/size of screen. Excellent brightness The cons: - There is no lens cap/cover. - The bag isn't so good. - The Epson design is better.
customer_reviews.author: Valter Zanchetti

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture, small, not noisy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a big screen. You need to have some control of light in the room because without this it can't look as well as in dark rooms. I use it in my family room to watch tv, play wii u and movies and all the family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymundo Z.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector and it worked fine for about a year. Then it went dead. After a couple phone calls to Acer's outsourced support, I had to pay $80 shipping to send it in for repair. Two weeks later I received it back. It worked for 3 days and broke again! I shipped it back, they returned it fixed. 3 months later it broke a third time! It is currently sitting in my garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase till date. Period!
customer_reviews.text: Never imagined, high quality HD and 3D experience can be so affordable. Mighty satisfied with the purchase and recommending friends and family to switch to this Projector.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my partner. He had been wanting it for years now and kept on telling me he was going to save up and get. I finally went and purchased this one (not knowing what he wanted exactly since he is VERY picky) and he absolutely loves it! He's a giant computer freak, and if he doesn't get something top notch he think's it's trash. The picture is amazing, we have it hooked up to his computer with HDMI cables. Even the 3D works wonderful! It's currently hanging from the ceiling projecting onto some blackout cloth and we use it everyday. I highly recommend this product if you are looking out for a projector.

customer_reviews.text: Nifty little projector, easy to set up, good picture on my ceiling. Did NOT come with 16 trained squirrels in matching pink tu-tus, as promised. customer_reviews.title: WORKED GREAT! (For 1 day)
customer_reviews.text: This projector is fantastic when it works. Deep blacks, bright vivid colors, etc. ..The problem is getting it to turn on. After just one day of use I received a lamp error when pressing the power button. I looked up the error in the manual and apparently its related to the color wheel getting stuck. Its a shame because I WAS really happy with the purchase (would have gave it 5 stars if not for the error).
customer_reviews.author: JT Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value for money projector if you don't want to shell out USD 1000 on a projector with similar specs. If you have a 3D bluray player, you can connect this and enjoy 3D with a pair of DLP glasses. Good picture quality and simple straight forward setup process too. You will not get a projector with this features on this price. An update, I have completed an year and 1000 hours on this Projector. Absolutely awesome and picture quality just like when it was new.

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D 720p projector
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cheapest projectors out there that supports the different formats of 3d. If you have 3D side-by-side movies on your computer they can easily be watched with stereoscopic player. This also works good with 3D blu-ray players or the ps3. The only con I have is it takes a while to load when turning on and when the screen changes.

product_meta.title: Acer H5370BD 3D Home Theater Projector (White)
product_meta.description:
The Acer H5370BD Projector brings movie quality projection with rich details, bright and natural colors and exceptional contrast. Color performance is enhanced on any surface, even colored walls through Acer's eColor Boost II+ technology and wall-color compensation, while ColorSafe II prevents color decay resulting from extended use of the projector. Handy installation utilities make setting up easy, and power-management solutions yield great energy savings while conserving the earth's resources.

AMAZON.COM
The Acer H5370BD Projector brings movie quality projection with rich details, bright and natural colors and exceptional contrast. Color performance is enhanced on any surface, even colored walls through Acer's eColor Boost II+ technology and wall-color compensation, while ColorSafe II prevents color decay resulting from extended use of the projector. Handy installation utilities make setting up easy and power-management solutions yield great energy savings while conserving the earth's resources. 




KEY FEATURES
 * Projection System: DLP® 
 * Display Panel: 0.62" DarkChipTM 3 DMD
 * Resolution: Native 720P (1280 x 720), Maximum UXGA (1600 x 1200), WUXGA (1900 x 1200)
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (native), 4:3
 * Contrast Ratio: 13000:1
 * Brightness: 2500 ANSI Lumens (Standard), 2000 ANSI Lumens (ECO)
 * Lamp Life: 5000 hours (Standard), 6000 hours (ECO), 10,000 Hours (ExtremeECO)
 * Projection Lens: F = 2.5 ~ 2.67, f = 21.86mm ~ 24.00mm, 1:1.1 Manual Zoom and Manual Focus
 * Keystone Correction: +/-40 degrees (Vertical), manual & auto
 * Input Interface: Analog RGB/Component Video (D-sub) x 2, Composite Video (RCA) x 1, S-Video (mini DIN) x 1, HDMI (Video, Audio, HDCP) x 1, PC Audio (Stereo mini jack) x 2
 * Control Interface: USB (mini-B) x 1, RS-232 (mini-DIN) x 1
 * Weight: 5.3 lbs. (system unit only)



LEARN MORE
MOVIE QUALITY PROJECTION



Native 720P widescreen resolution delivers a true cinematic experience for the latest high-def content. It is the perfect fit for widescreen movies created in Blu-ray Disc™ and HDTV formats, as the content mirrors the original creation and every single detail is perfectly preserved with true-to-master precision. 

Acer H5370BD projector adds depth to entertainment with instant 2D-to-3D conversion in high definition. Support for popular 3D technologies, such as Blu-ray 3D, DLP 3D, and NVIDIA 3DTV Play enable multiple 3D options and maximum multidimensional fun! 


HASSLE-FREE USABILITY



Found easily on the IR remote control, the Acer Empowering Technology key provides instant access to all Acer Projector technologies; ePower Management, eView Management, eTimer Management and eOpening Management. 

Acer ColorBoost II+ improves natural color temperature to achieve optical color balance, and enhances color brightness according to content by working with Acer eView Management, which provides scenario modes with a color-specific refined waveform. 

The Instant Resume feature allows the projector to resume projection right after it has been turned off. Users can turn the projector on and off any time during the 2-minute shutdown progress, so they don't have to worry about accidentally turning off the projector or wait for a long cooling period before resuming projection. 


VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY & ECO FRIENDLY



A projector equipped with at least two connectors for multiple-PC source input, including D-Sub and HDMI™, offers more flexible connectivity and instant switching. 

With Acer SpectraBoost, a wider color gamut is achieved via patented color-wheel coating technology that boosts color saturation an extra 30%.

With the Installation menu, signal input from a notebook is no longer required to enable the OSD menu, making projector installation on the ceiling faster, easier and more convenient.

The world leading ExtremeECO technology enables the breakthrough of lamp power control with the capability of dimming lamp down to 30% of full lamp power. The projector will automatically enter ExtremeECO mode for saving power if there is no any signal input. With ExtremeECO, the power consumption of the projector can be reduced up to 70% and the lamp life can be extended as well.
